html:
Roles, voice types, premiere cast
Role
(en=Name used in productions in English,
fr=Name in original French production) 		Voice type Premiere cast, 30 December 1921
Conductor: Sergei Prokofiev
King of Clubs (en) / Le Roi de Trèfle (fr), ruler of an imaginary kingdom bass
The Prince (en) / Le Prince (fr), his son tenor
Princess (en) / Princesse (fr) Clarice, the king's niece contralto
Leandro (en) / Léandre (fr), the prime minister baritone
Truffaldino (en) / Trouffaldino (fr), the court jester tenor
Pantalone (en) / Pantalon (fr), the king's advisor baritone
Tchelio (en) / Tchélio (fr), a magician bass
Fata Morgana, a witch soprano
Princess (en) / Princesse (fr) Ninette, Orange No. 3 soprano
Princess (en) / Princesse (fr) Linette, Orange No. 1 contralto
Princess (en) / Princesse (fr) Nicolette, Orange No. 2 mezzo-soprano
Smeraldina (en) / Sméraldina (fr), Fata Morgana's servant mezzo-soprano
Farfarello, a demon bass
Cook (en) / La Cuisinière (fr), giant custodian of the three oranges bass
Master of Ceremonies (en) / Le Maître de Cérémonies (fr) tenor
Herald (en) / Héraut (fr) bass
Advocates of Tragedy, Comedy, Lyric Drama, and Farce; Ten "Ridicules" (Cranks); little demons; courtiers, monsters, drunkards, gluttons, guards, servants, soldiers
